Solver

Contains logic for the numeric solver component

Functions
SelectTable
call Solver.SelectTable(
dataTable,
&selectResult
);

Instruct the solver component to use the specified data table for calculation

Parameters
dataTable

the data table to use.  See DataManager

Response Parameters
&selectResult

whether the table was selected successfuly

SelectEquation
call Solver.SelectEquation(
equationIndex,
&selectResult
);

Instruct the solver component to use the specified equation when calculating a result

Equations
0

Best-fit Sphere.  Requires exactly 3 columns of (x, y, z) input data

1

Best-fit Circle.  Requires exactly 2 columns of (x, z) input data

2

Solid-Body Offset.  Requires exactly 6 columns of (expected x, y, z), (measured x, y, z) input data

Parameters
equationIndex

The desired equation to use for the calculation

Response Parameters
&selectResult

the result of the selection operation

Solve
call Solver.Solve();

Instruct the solver component to numerically solve the specified equation with the specified table.  Results are stored in _SolverDataArr()

GetSolutionValue

Utility function to retrieve a value from the _SolverDataArr() storage structure

Parameters
index

the index in the _SolverDataArr() structure to query

Response Parameters
&value

the value at the specified index
